ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: those who deny the Day of Reckoning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Who call the Day of judgement a lie!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: those that give the lie to the Day of Recompense.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and those who have rejected the Day of Judgment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Those who deny the Day of Justice.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Those who deny the Day of Recompense.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Who give the lie to the day of judgment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: who cry lies to the Day of Doom;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Those who deny the Day of Judgment
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: those who deny the Day of Judgement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Those who belie the Day of Requital.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: who deny the Day of Retribution;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Those that deny the Day of Judgment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Those who deny the Day of Recompense.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: who belied the Day of Recompense!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Those who deny the Day of Reckoning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Who deny the Day of Recompense.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [83:11] who deny the Day of Judgement, [the Day of] Requital (alladhīna yukadhdhibūna bi-yawmi’l-dīn: either a substitution for or an explication of al-mukadhdhibīna, ‘the deniers’);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Those who deny the Day of Judgement) and the Reckoning which will take place in it
